name: Instagram profile scraper TAP
description: Scrape all Instagram profile info. Add one or more Instagram usernames and extract number of followers & follows, URLs, bio, posts, likes, counts, related profiles, captions, highlight reels, and more. Download structured data in JSON, CSV, XML, Excel, and HTML to use in applications and reports.
chat_presentation: Hi, I'm Instagram profiles TAP. I can help you to get data about Instagram profiles. You can get results by providing a Instagram profile username (no other filter is supported).
